LanguageData.Desc_Uplift: Moderately boost a colonist's mood with nice words, lasting 2 days.
LanguageData.Desc_PepTalk: Give a colonist a pep-talk, increasing their productivity for 1 day.
LanguageData.Desc_PetAnimal: Pet a tamed, unbonded animal to bond with it.
LanguageData.Desc_Proselytize: Talk to a colonist about your ideology, to try to convert them.
LanguageData.Desc_Torture: Beating prisoners will lower their will.
LanguageData.Desc_OperantTraining: Use brute force to train a tamed animal's next trainable instantly.
LanguageData.Desc_Oversee: Interaction option to oversee a slave, giving them a boost in productivity for 1 day.
LanguageData.Desc_FearMonger: Killing a pawn in combat, has a low chance of causing their faction to flee.
